item.title: The shutdown is starting to ‘bite the economy,’ top Trump aide warns. The Senate is struggling to make a deal.
item.description: A top economist in the Trump administration offered a fresh warning Friday about the record-setting government shutdown’s damaging effects, as the Sen...

item.title: ‘He lives paycheck to paycheck’: My husband pays his bills late and sits at home playing on his computer. How do I fix it?
item.description: “He seems to think ‘bill due’ dates are a suggestion. He has literally no savings.”

item.title: ‘She got divorced 4 years ago’: My friend, 72, has one son. Does she need to write a will?
item.description: “He is already on her bank accounts.”

item.title: I’m selling my condo and have $130K to invest. Is this a bad time to invest in the S&P 500?
item.description: ‘What is the smartest way to create income with this money?’

item.title: Home prices are overinflated in many parts of the U.S. Are we in a housing bubble?
item.description: Home prices are rising to new heights, yet sales have remained largely depressed.
